subject: Athletics and Sports
Television
Computer and Video Games
lead_paragraph: The rage over competitions like “Dancing With the Stars” and “American Idol” isn’t a rationalized phase but a social shift that, in part, reflects a quantifiable disillusionment with mainstream sports.
snippet: The rage over competitions like “Dancing With the Stars” and “American Idol” isn’t a rationalized phase but a social shift that, in part, reflects a quantifiable disillusionment with mainstream sports.
